name: UAYEB: The Dry Land - Episode 1
description: UAYEB: The Dry Land - Episode 1 is a solo story driven adventure / survival / puzzle game, on the path of the Mayan civilization, placed in an open world with the immersive First Person view.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit, Windows 8.1 64-Bit, Windows 10 64-Bit Processor: Quad Core I7 CPU @ 2.80GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 or equivalent. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit, Windows 8.1 64-Bit, Windows 10 64-Bit Processor: Quad Core I7 CPU @ 3.80GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 / GTX 1070 or greater with 8GB RAM. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
